_description: The Towneley, or Wakefield, Cycle of Mystery Plays — thirty-two plays in various rhyme schemes

HunHM1.First Lines:
EGo sum alpha et o
I am the first the last also…
HunHM1.Last Lines: …A fayrer child from tope to tooMan neuer se ayre
HunHM1.Note:
Preceding first line, ‘IN dei nomine Amen Assit principio
                        sancta maria meo Wakefelde’ (f. 1). For other eds. of individual
                    plays, see Lumiansky  and  Mills (1974)
XR. M. Lumiansky,   and  David Mills.  
             The Chester Mystery Cycle.
             2 vols. 
             EETS
         s.s. 3, 9 (1974, 1986),
                    1581.
